Functions

fillna(series[, method])

Fill the NA values

get_patches(ts, pieces, string, centers, ...)

Follow original ABBA smooth reconstruction, creates a dictionary of patches from time series data using the clustering result.

image_compress(fabba, data[, adjust])

image compression.

image_decompress(fabba, strings)

image decompression.

patched_reconstruction(series, pieces, ...)

An alternative reconstruction procedure which builds patches for each cluster by extrapolating/intepolating the segments and taking the mean.

symbolsAssign(clusters[, alphabet_set])

Automatically assign symbols to different groups, start with '!'

fABBA([tol, alpha, sorting, scl, verbose, ...])

fABBA: A fast sorting-based aggregation method for symbolic time series representation
